section.body:
Faceless dolls who communicate entirely through failing the turing test.
Oh.
Wait.
You were serious. Uh.
Players are...the people who play SBURB?

section.header: Question: Where is everything better than expected?
section.body: Holy shit, I'm not just going to TELL you. It's a myserty.

section.header: The consorts say I have the Denizen.... JavaScript? What is up with that.
Apparently I have the Denizen.... Hair7?
section.body:
JR Hacks the FAQ: Lololool.
Okay. Hold on. Let me just....take over for a bit.
Hair7 is my personal nemesis, enshrined as a Denizen for all time. It is the stupidest possible bug, and yet it keeps coming back. I accidentally archived Nepeta's hair as 'Hair7.png" and not "hair7.png" and no amount of effort and yelling could convince the archive to remember the true name for very long.
And yes. Nepeta breaking the sim is canon. AB's irrational hatred is justified.
Congrats, you got the hardest possible denizen tier, it doesn't even relate to your aspect. Good luck!

Shit! Who told you about that!? I... I mean uh. There is no such thing and anyone you tells you different is insane and likely to go Murder Mode any minute. I advise you to kill them as quickly as possible. Multiple times.

section.header: Question: Hey can you give me PR3M1UM gigglesnort?
Question: I beat my Denizen, have I beat the game?
section.body: No, hell no. Even if your session went better than most then you still have two eldritch monstrosities to fight! And if you found this FAQ then you are definitely not in one of those sessions. So prepare for the next ultimate boss fight, the next monster will actually want to win.

section.header: Why are these FAQs being made?
section.body: Not much else to do in a null session, is there?

section.header: Question: What is the answer to ???
Question: Where is everything better than expected?
section.body: Holy shit, I'm not just going to TELL you. It's a myserty.

section.header: Question: My denizen is just a title what do i do?!?!
section.body: Answer: [Critical Threat] You know how Wastes lack restraint? Well, JR and PL kinda sorta got into the source code of the game and added something a little... narcissistic in. KR, of course, was pissed as hell. These denizens are POWERFUL.

section.header: How many Player has JR killed?
